Name: respect_project_budget
Description: The total cost of a project must not exceed its allocated budget.

Name: fixed_sprint_duration
Description: The duration of any sprint must not exceed a predefined maximum (e.g.

Name: team_size_constraints
Description: A team must have a size between a minimum (e.g.

Name: respect_worker_availability
Description: The total effort of tasks assigned to a worker cannot exceed their availability.

Name: story_points_less_than_velocity
Description: The sum of story points in a sprint backlog must not exceed the team's velocity.

Name: one_team_per_worker
Description: A worker must be assigned to exactly one team for a given project.

Name: mandatory_scrum_roles
Description: Each team must have exactly one Product Owner and one Scrum Master.

Name: release_date_constraint
Description: A feature planned for a release cannot be completed after the release's planned date.

Name: epic_story_dependency
Description: A user story can only be scheduled if its parent epic is also scheduled.

Name: blocker_halts_task
Description: A task with a high-severity active blocker cannot have its status set to 'done'.

Name: sprint_goal_must_exist
Description: Every sprint must have one and only one associated sprint goal.

Name: skill_must_exist_for_task
Description: A task requiring a specific skill can only be assigned to a worker who possesses that skill.
